text: Vladimir "Vlada" Divljan (Serbian Cyrillic: Владимир Дивљан; 10 May 1958 - 4 March 2015), was a Serbian singer and songwriter. He was known as the frontman for the Serbian and former Yugoslav rock band Idoli. He died from appendix cancer. ==Other websites== * * "Ludvig i Steva", interview, Vreme weekly news magazine * YouTube * VIS Idoli at YouTube Category:1958 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Serbian singer-songwriters Category:Musicians from Belgrade
title: Vlada Divljan
